discount-price-description: Within the country borders from as low as HUF 750
insurance-description: In all cases, the trasnported items are insured.
cash-on-delivery-management-description: You will receive your money within 72 hours of collecting the cash on delivery.
simple-integration-description: Transferring your delivery needs can be easily integrated into any web shop engine. We also provide technical assistance to accomplish all of this.
user-friendly-administration-interface-d: Track your packages. Of course, tracking is also available for your clients.
transparent-invoicing-description: We issue one itemized invoice per month for all your shipping assignment.
